text: Lian River may refer to: * Lian River (), whose estuary is at Haimen of Chaoyang District, Shantou, Guangdong Province * Lian River (Qu River) (), a tributary of Qu River in Yunan Province * Lianjiang River (连江), a river in northwestern Guangdong, the largest tributary of North River in the Pearl River system * Lianshui River (AKA Lian River, ), one of the largest tributaries of Xiang River
title: Lian River (disambiguation)
